channel.title: Dragon att emotes and death emotes!
channel.description: Hi, i need the code to get most dragons to die and attack properly :) thanks!

item.title: Dragon att emotes and death emotes!
item.dc:creator: @mikescott mikescott
item.description:
@mikescott wrote:

Go find them :] Play around with different actions, gfx etc. For a command that makes it easier to find gfx, use this:

[code]f (command.startsWith(“gfx”)) {
int id = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(4));
outStream.createFrame(85);
outStream.writeByteC(absY - (mapRegionY * 8));
outStream.writeByteC(absX - (mapRegionX * 8));
outStream.createFrame(4);
outStream.writeByte(0);//Tiles away (X >> 4 + Y & 7)
outStream.writeWord(id);//Graphic id
outStream.writeByte(0);//height of the spell above it’s basic place, i think it’s written in pixels 100 pixels high
outStream.writeWord(0);//Time before casting the graphic

}[/code]

Read full topic
item.source: Dragon att emotes and death emotes!
